articles.title: Carlton Davis gives his pitch for free agents to join Patriots this offseason
articles.description:
"The way an organization treats its players means a lot, especially to me."

The post Carlton Davis gives his pitch for free agents to join Patriots this offseason appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Carlton Davis encourages free agents to consider the Patriots this offseason.
Davis emphasizes player treatment as a key factor for potential signings.
Improved recruitment could enhance the Patriots' competitiveness in the upcoming season.
